TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi abstract beforefieldinit FontCollection extends System.Object implements class System.IDisposable

Docs.summary: Provides a base class for installed and private font collections.

remarks.format: ## Remarks The <xref:System.Drawing.Text.FontCollection> allows you to get a list of the font families contained in the collection with its <xref:System.Drawing.Text.FontCollection.Families%2A> property. For additional information on fonts and text, including example code, see [Using Fonts and Text](~/docs/framework/winforms/advanced/using-fonts-and-text.md).

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance void Dispose() cil managed

Docs.summary: Releases all resources used by this .

remarks.format:
## Remarks Call <xref:System.Drawing.Text.FontCollection.Dispose%2A> when you are finished using the <xref:System.Drawing.Text.FontCollection>. The <xref:System.Drawing.Text.FontCollection.Dispose%2A> method leaves the <xref:System.Drawing.Text.FontCollection> in an unusable state. After calling <xref:System.Drawing.Text.FontCollection.Dispose%2A>, you must release all references to the <xref:System.Drawing.Text.FontCollection> so the garbage collector can reclaim the memory that the <xref:System.Drawing.Text.FontCollection> was occupying. For more information, see [Cleaning Up Unmanaged Resources](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/unmanaged.md) and [Implementing a Dispose Method](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/implementing-dispose.md).
> [!NOTE] > Always call <xref:System.Drawing.Text.FontCollection.Dispose%2A> before you release your last reference to the <xref:System.Drawing.Text.FontCollection>. Otherwise, the resources it is using will not be freed until the garbage collector calls the <xref:System.Drawing.Text.FontCollection> object's `Finalize` method.

MemberSignature.Value: .method familyhidebysig newslot virtual instance void Dispose(bool disposing) cil managed

Docs.param: to release both managed and unmanaged resources; to release only unmanaged resources.
Docs.summary: Releases the unmanaged resources used by the and optionally releases the managed resources.

remarks.format:
## Remarks This method is called by the public `Dispose()` method and the <xref:System.Object.Finalize%2A> method. `Dispose()` invokes the protected `Dispose(Boolean)` method with the `disposing` parameter set to `true`. <xref:System.Object.Finalize%2A> invokes `Dispose` with `disposing` set to `false`.
When the `disposing` parameter is true, this method releases all resources held by any managed objects that this <xref:System.Drawing.Text.FontCollection> references. This method invokes the `Dispose()` method of each referenced object.

block.para:
can be called multiple times by other objects. When overriding be careful not to reference objects that have been previously disposed of in an earlier call to . For more information about how to implement , see [Implementing a Dispose Method](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/implementing-dispose.md).
For more information about and , see [Cleaning Up Unmanaged Resources](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/unmanaged.md) and [Overriding the Finalize Method](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/8026cb68-fe93-43fc-96c1-c09ad7d64cd3).

Docs.summary: Gets the array of objects associated with this .

MemberSignature.Value: .method familyhidebysig virtual instance void Finalize() cil managed

Docs.summary: Allows an object to try to free resources and perform other cleanup operations before it is reclaimed by garbage collection.
